headline: Eaton (ETN) Charges Ahead with Grid Modernization in Resilient Power Deal
summary: Eaton Corporation, PLC (NYSE:ETN) is one of the Best Industrial Automation Stocks to Buy for the Next Decade. Eaton Corporation, PLC (NYSE: ETN) announced on Tuesday that it has signed an agreement to acquire Resilient Power Systems Inc., a Texas-based developer of solid-state transformer technology used in high-power direct current (DC) applications. The deal, expected […]

headline: Eaton to announce second quarter 2025 earnings on August 5, 2025
summary: DUBLIN, July 18, 2025--Intelligent power management company Eaton (NYSE:ETN) will announce second quarter 2025 earnings on Tuesday, August 5, 2025, before the opening of the New York Stock Exchange. The company will host a conference call at 11 a.m. Eastern time that day to discuss second quarter 2025 earnings results with securities analysts and institutional investors.
